Revised the paper ( https://t.co/AdXRBKzXVz) to add a third construction of Rainbow channels, based on "physical settlement."   Remarkably, this new construction allows non-custodial synthetic trading of Bitcoin inside Ethereum payment channels, without a price oracle!
